Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MC_Lock::MC_Lock ( MC_CritSection *  pCS  ) 

This sets up the lock for the accessing thread.

Handles locking on entry and auomatically unlocks when going out of scope by using the deconstructor to do so. Prevents threads hanging in case of some sort of untrapped exception being thrown.
